text: <https://github.com/vim-jp/vim/pull/3> 更新した。scrlines:0 の速度が改善したはず。代わりに scrlines:1 の速度は悪化。

attachments.fallback: GitHub: WIP: Optimize directx by k-takata · Pull Request #3 · vim-jp/vim
attachments.title: WIP: Optimize directx by k-takata · Pull Request #3 · vim-jp/vim
attachments.text: There was a report that 8.0.1369 caused slowdown on some environment: <https://groups.google.com/d/msg/vim_dev/2AaZMN1T6K8/x4QxC_XbBQAJ> This PR is trying to solve it.
